meanings.definition: A type of wood used for making furniture.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter crafted a beautiful chair out of harewood.
meanings.sent2: The table was made of smooth harewood.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns in the harewood trunk.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, bouncing off the harewood walls.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh harewood filled the workshop, inspiring the craftsman.

meanings.definition: A type of tree that produces harewood.
meanings.sent1: The forest was filled with tall harewood trees.
meanings.sent2: The leaves of the harewood tree rustled in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped happily in the branches of the harewood tree.
meanings.sent4: The harewood tree stood strong against the storm, its roots deeply anchored.
meanings.sent5: The shade under the harewood tree was a welcome relief on a hot day.

meanings.definition: The color of harewood wood, typically a light brown.
meanings.sent1: The harewood dresser matched the warm tones of the room.
meanings.sent2: The harewood flooring added a touch of elegance to the house.
meanings.sent3: The artist mixed paints to recreate the exact shade of harewood.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the same hue as harewood in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The harewood beams glowed softly in the evening light.
